title: Square Deal
description: "Call me crazy, but I didn't think Miss Hard-Ass of Happily Ever Afters would have a one-night stand with her best friend's best man."Weddings have a way of turning the most cynical person into a puddle of sappy, blubbering goo. After all my years of experience as a wedding planner, I should know. And the biggest problem with that?I’m Hannah Jane Hayes, and I’m already a complete sap.Love at first sight? Kissing in the rain? Grand gestures? Happily ever after? Yes, please!Weddings put hope in my hopelessly romantic heart. They remind me to wake up every morning believing that today could be the day I meet my soulmate.Unfortunately, today would not be that day, because I was stuck babysitting the best man from hell: Isaac Lawson. He’s a playboy real estate mogul, my best friend’s best man, and perpetual pain in my ass.One too many glasses of champagne later, and I’m more than willing to make a deal with the devil if it means getting out of my dry spell. Isaac says it’ll be square. Fair. Just one epic night with no strings attached, and no awkward morning after.Get ready for an enemies to lovers, opposites attract romantic comedy with a meet-hate at a poker club wedding, a date-wrecking hero, a sassy, southern belle heroine, a taboo moment at a burlesque club, and a swan attack induced happily ever after. Isaac Lawson is used to dominating in the boardroom and the bedroom. That is, until he meets the one woman on earth who is less than impressed. It’s going to take everything in him to keep from falling harder than a brick off the side of the Empire State Building.STEAM LEVEL: Five Alarm Fire!The Beaufort Poker Club series is meant to be enjoyed in order. Start with book one, Poker Face: a steamy enemies to lovers romance!
author: Maggie C. Gates
